description:
- Customizable enough
- Tilable and multi session
- Light enough
- Multi input with opened terminals
- Saving sessions
- Gnome 3 look & feel 

Great project !
Just perfect! just does what other terminals doesn't.
Beautiful and functional. Has even a quake mode.

Terminix actually shows that you can do both: Provide a modern user interface, that integrates nicely into the GNOME desktop and embraces the modern UI components GTK offers, but also provide many advanced features power users will love. Tiling, desktop notifications, saved sessions and more make this the perfect choice for everybody who is using the terminal on a daily basis.
summary: Great terminal emulator for GNOME with advanced features

description: I really dont know what else to add here! Terminix is simply the best Linux Desktop application ever made!
Integrates nicely with GNOME and works well for HiDPI displays (unlike terminator w/ GTK2).
summary: Works well and feels like a native GNOME app

description: Works wonders, has a quake mode, and the maintainer is nice and very reactive. My everyday terminal for the last year!
